item.title: Almost all Disagreements Come from Misunderstanding
item.description: Almost All Disagreements Come From Misunderstanding If you clear up misunderstanding or different [[Definition|Definitions]], you will be golden!

item.title: Researching Vs. Explaining Strategies (Patterns Versus Stories)
item.description: Researching Vs. Explaining Strategies (Patterns Versus Stories) “When researching strategies, emphasize patterns over stories. One person succeeding means nothing. 100 people succeeding is a signal.
